title: KupaCrypto
author: KupaCrypto
content: As the election date done dey very close , we need carry our pvc vote the right candidates, candidates wey go bring the dividends of democracy come meet people wey elect them put for office. We done tire for people wey dey put their personal needs over the masses , now wey we get three frontline candidates from three different political parties we need vote wisely becos e Dan Tay we get three front line candidates dating back to 1983 when we been get shehu shagari, Nnamdi Azikiwe and obafemi awolowo.We no know the next time we go get three front line choices from the three main ethnic groups, so make we no vote ethnicity or tribe make we vote competence.Make we select the best candidate out of them and give our country Nigeria a good leader wey go carry our matter for head.

comments.author: HajiBagi
comments.body: You sound very well sha and na waiting dey make some of our people dey choose wrong person you talk so because mostly some people don't know what the meaning of choosing a good leader, mostly people choose their tribe without knowing his character or behavior and also know the background of the person dey are about to vote for, and you know how we Nigerians take stubborn no matter how they try to talk some senses or better things to some people na for that place the person go get enemies.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: All I fit talk be say make we take this forthcoming general elections very seriously. If we miss it this time many of us would be affected, just reason am well and add eight year to you present year and you go see the time of disaster wey go happen of the wrong person become president.Guys make we forget religion, tribe and sentiments also bribe and do the wise thing. By now we know the person thatâ€™s more credible amongst the candidates so letâ€™s vote that person.

comments.author: ife2020
comments.body: When e turn to election ccycle, there are no rights; there are no wrongs because na until leader reach there you go sabi the type of person wey e be. As Nigerians; we de always console ourselves with "antecedents" as excuse but e no de really matter. Come 2023 elections, make everybody go exercise their rights without intimidation and fear. Candidates weh de ground reach 10 for presidential election, but make everybody no forget say; as una de find good candidate for Nigeria, de find good candidate for your senatorial districts and house of representatives.Goodluck to everyone biko

comments.author: Dzwaafu11
comments.body: It will be well for all of us in the country.. But na we they spoil things with our hands by voting wrong person or selling our vote if we are going to vote for money that means we sell the vote and if you sell something you don't expect that thing to come back for YOU. Any body wey you sell am for you don't expect him to do better things because na buy him buy and he's expensive profit so how did we expect him to be a good leader no it can't work that way... We just have to know who to vote during the election

comments.author: Mr.right85
comments.body: As 4 ur topic, Oyibo dey say, "Nevr say nevr 4 Vegas". On dis note, I go like borrow dat term say, "Nevr say nevr 4 naija". I understnd watin u dey try talk shah bt, e con sound lik say, na 2 giv up on d nation if dis pple still manage succeed wth dere ways (God 4bid) bt, we go still dey try.On top of dat, e dey vry important say we get am right dis time. Dis go pave way no onli 4 better 4 d nation bt, e go brng d trust in d electoria process nd leaders bck 2 d pple. D godfatherism nd favoritism don too mch. D whol tin don ridicule d idea of democracy way con mak am feel lik d worst 4 of governance.Quote from: KupaCrypto on January 12, 2023, 02:49:42 PMMake we select the best candidate out of them and give our country Nigeria a good leader wey go carry our matter for head.We reali nid gud leadership 4 dis nation. Persn way go sabi use watin we get develop us. Gud leadership na evrytin. As a nation, we dey properly positioned nd blessd richly in resources bt, since Oyibo turn us against ourcef, corrupt our mind 2 mak our leadership abt watin we ft acquire, we don champion d tin so tayyyy, e don b watin we no ft commot bodi 4.We nid gud leadership 4 d nation!

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Abeg this year na our year to get it right, Abeg go get your pvc now and be prepared for the next month general elections, I wonâ€™t tell yâ€™all who to vote for because we all go suffer am if we get am wrong and we all go still enjoy am if e better.The election journey has shown us who go really lead the country well make we talk true. We fit not survive another four or even eight years of bad leadership.

comments.author: SOKO-DEKE
comments.body: As we they hear naso we they also see write up sai we make vote wisely. Toh the election is getting close and closer everyday make we they try they advise your friends and families make they try and vote in betas candidates for this election, those candidates when fit push naija to beta positions.But my problem now be sai many of us go vote for party not candidate. Abeg make we try forget about party make we focus on candidates,no be by party now, na by good candidate. I done see many candidates when no get beta party but they are good candidates with beta ambitions.so let vote wisely

comments.author: martyns
comments.body: For this coming election,I believe the right persons nai go enter into power now because because if everybody come out from their different houses on that election day,carry our votes give person wey qualify for the position, you go see say our votes no go be waste.Campaign don dey go on everywhere for the country and the different states them,some persons dey talk say if their candidates no qualify,say the election go bloody.we go just try to avoid anything wahala for that day election,and try to just cast our votes,and I believe say if we give our votes to the right person,every were go maramma.

comments.author: Nobility17
comments.body: OP, I really like this your caption. The truth be say the rate at which the economy dey hard on a daily dey make us make choices without reasoning the later consequences. When the people we call leaders enter into power they ignore their responsibilities and work towards achieving their personal interests. So with these experiences, e dey very difficult to tell person say make him/her vote without reasoning to collect money which will then result to wrong choices of candidates. But realistically, this is not another chance to get it right but the last chance to get it right.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: get it right this time or try again after 4 or 8 years ðŸ¤ .Well, I hope everybody gets their PVC and votes wisely when the time comes. I also hope the election doesn't get rigged this time, because most times those men have a tendency to do things in their favor just to put in whomever they so desire.

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: We will get it right this time. The signs are already in the air. And this is not just going to be for Nigeria and Nigerians only, it will be for Africa and for Nations all over the world that are facing oppressive regimes. This one is for our unborn children. We will get it right. We are awake now and nothing can stop us now. Even those in the opposition party know the truth and are there for the money. On the D-day, they will vote for competence and integrity. After all, nor be all of us don see shege?

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: My prayers be say make God help make Dem no rig this election, because I no trust this INEC people,Nigerians we know who we want to be our president, we know who dey capable, and na that person we go vote for, we must get it right this time , nai make I dey urge every lover of Nigeria to go collect their PVC, so that we go come together and give our mandate to who we want, weather Satan likes it or not, we must get am right this time, we go do am

comments.author: Cryptomultiplier
comments.body: Quote from: KupaCrypto on January 12, 2023, 02:49:42 PMAs the election date done dey very close , we need carry our pvc vote the right candidates, candidates wey go bring the dividends of democracy come meet people wey elect them put for office. We done tire for people wey dey put their personal needs over the masses , now wey we get three frontline candidates from three different political parties we need vote wisely becos e Dan Tay we get three front line candidates dating back to 1983 when we been get shehu shagari, Nnamdi Azikiwe and obafemi awolowo.We no know the next time we go get three front line choices from the three main ethnic groups, so make we no vote ethnicity or tribe make we vote competence.Make we select the best candidate out of them and give our country Nigeria a good leader wey go carry our matter for head.As much as the Frontline candidates are concerned, the fulfilment of their campaign agenda is but a political promise to be held accountable to the budget on redeeming the debt that has been accumulated so far.Â The best candidate may be subjected to the power circle or cabal that controls the system and thus may be forced to play to the tune of their successor.Â  We have to get it right by voting, but we must also be ready to give these leaders heat once elected, so they don't fail to fulfill their part/promises and ease the economic, security , healthcare and unemployment constrain that has been escalating over recent times.

We just have to know who to vote during the election Omo guy, the country done cast, the country they move backwards, can u imagine a country wey they use money they buy money, you get money for account wey you no fit use becos the bank ATM no dey dispense money at the moment or the POS charges too much or network no dey for bank transfer, na the situation we find ourselves, them dey do all this things so there opponents no go see money buy votes without thinking about the hardships the masses face as a result of this, Omo I no dey happy , make we vote them out , for me self to to allow Aso rock stay for four years without president make every body rest .
